message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you. Given its unique value, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,450,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that price is way too high for me.  I'm interested in the product, but I'd need to see it closer to $800,000 to make this work.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I value your offer,  $800,000 is significantly below the market value of this product.  To be fair to both of us, I could consider a price of $1,300,000.

Alice, I understand this product is valuable, but so is my time.  $1,300,000 is still too far from what I'm willing to pay. If you're serious about selling, I could go up to $950,000.  That's my final offer.
